summary: Embrace you dragon blood. Breath fire and ice like a true Dovahkiin!
descriptionHtml:
So I'm sure that pretty much everyone who ever picked up all 3 words for the fire breath shout was as disappointed as me. This is why I went to all this trouble?! So I could sneeze a little flame at my enemies?
<br/>
<br/>I felt cheated, obviously. Thne along came [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18738/?]DragonFire - Tactically Enhanced Breath Shouts[/url], and I was a fan right of the bat. This mod worked well for me, but its age and lack of updates was starting to show.
<br/>
<br/>And so when I set out to look for an alternative, I came across [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79034/?]Dragonfire Reborn - True Dragon Fire and Frost Breath[/url]. This gem (that you ought to go download and endorse), took the best parts of all the mods that touched these shouts and made something that felt really well balanced. There was just one caveat, and it was in the form of a soft incompatibility with the Dragonborn DLC. You see, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8520770]Wabafloo[/url]'s mod only applied the Black Book rewards on the first word of each shout.
<br/>
<br/>I wanted all words to be affected, so here we are. I fired up the CreationKit (many times with repeated crashing), and made this.[b][color=#ff7700]
<br/>
<br/>[/color][/b]
author: TheTaleTeller
